column4: hey can someone help me? i have hardy and out of nowhere it started to say this when i boot up "ï»¿hey guys when i start my laptop it says "your screen and graphics card could not be detected correctly"
do you have any ideas what i should do about this "your screen and graphics card could not be detected correctly"
do you have a desktop installation cd nearby?
pop one in, reboot your computer, see if it detects the settings right
i dont know what happened but after i rebooted with the cd everything is back to normal. thank you for your help
when you take the cd out, you'll probably end up in the same situation
well i took the cd out and rebooted again a second time without the cd in the drive and right now everything is working as it was when i first installed hardy
thats what im saying. thanks for the help Myrtti
no prob, stay on the channel in return to help others with their problems :-)
i would but im very new and trying to learn everything from scratch on my own so i dont think i would be much help to anyone :-(
now, after three years I work in an open source software development company, working from home
stick around and you'll learn new things
have a good flight with Ubuntu Airlines
